title: Remove landing page tagline and Admin Portal card

requirements.summary: Update LandingPage to remove the marketing tagline paragraph and the entire Admin Portal card, and re-center remaining content into a single-card layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The landing page no longer renders the paragraph text "Streamline your financial operations with our comprehensive management platform".
The landing page no longer renders an "Admin Portal" card or an "Access Admin Portal" button.
The landing page still renders without layout breakage; remaining content is centered and looks intentional (e.g., the grid is adjusted to a single card layout).
No unused imports or dead code remain in LandingPage.tsx (e.g., admin icon import/click handler removed if no longer used).

file_operations.description:
Remove the marketing tagline

block, delete the entire Admin Portal (including icon/title/description/button), and remove related dead code (e.g., Building2 import and handleAdminPortalClick). Adjust the container/grid classes so the remaining Customer Portal card is centered and uses a single-card layout (e.g., remove md:grid-cols-2 and reduce max width accordingly) while continuing to compose existing shadcn/ui Card/Button components without editing files under frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
